00035 class GamePlayer {
00036         public:
00037                 GamePlayer();
00038                 ~GamePlayer();
00039                 
00040                 //** Initialize the player class
00041                 void Init( const char* image = NULL );
00042 
00043                 //** Draws the player to the engine screen
00044                 void Draw( SDL_Surface* mainScreen );
00045                 
00046                 //** Calculates any necessary player logic
00047                 void Update();
00048 
00049                 //** Sets the player to either move left or not
00050                 void SetMoveLeft( const bool& flag );
00051 
00052                 //** Sets the player to either move right or not
00053                 void SetMoveRight( const bool& flag );
00054 
00055                 //** Sets the player to either move up or not
00056                 void SetMoveUp( const bool& flag );
00057 
00058                 //** Sets the player to either move down or not
00059                 void SetMoveDown( const bool& flag );
00060 
00061         private:
00062                 //** Path to an image representing the object
00063                 char* imagePath;
00064 
00065                 //** Flag controlling player upward movement
00066                 bool moveUp;
00067 
00068                 //** Flag controlling player downward movement
00069                 bool moveDown;
00070 
00071                 //** Flag controlling player leftward movement
00072                 bool moveLeft;
00073 
00074                 //** Flag controlling player rightward movement
00075                 bool moveRight;
00076 
00077                 //** Position and size information for the Player object
00078                 SDL_Rect dimensions;
00079 
00080                 //** Surface holding the player's image
00081                 SDL_Surface* playerSurface;
00082 };
